scripts.dev: service mongodb start && concurrently "cd service-provider-1 && nodemon server.js" " cd service-provider-2 && nodemon server.js" " cd service-integrator && nodemon server.js"
scripts.start: service mongodb start && cd service-provider-1 && npm i && cd .. && cd service-provider-2 && npm i && cd .. && cd service-integrator && npm i && cd .. && concurrently "cd service-provider-1 && npm start" " cd service-provider-2 && npm start" " cd service-integrator && npm start"
